title.narrative: Ouganda - Projet d'Appui au Secteur Routier II (Fort Portal - Bundibugyo - Lamia Road)
Uganda - Road Sector Support Project II (Fort Portal – Bundibugyo – Lamia Road)

description.narrative: 2.1 To improve the road transport service levels between Kabarole and Bundibuygo districts and by so doing, provide access by the majority of rural people to socio-economic facilities and integration to the rest of the country and also support regional integration with DRC 2.2,,To enable decision - making in the investment on 4 road development projects based on analytically and objectively assessed information (Kagama - Ishaka, Ntungamo - Kakitumba Kapchorwa - Suam and Hoima to Kaiso-Tonya)

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
